messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT: Bea's whereabouts?
messages.msgSnippet: Looks like it was a non-event. I checked with the Inglis family on the Big Island and they were safe. I have a hula friend visiting family on Oʻahu and sheʻs
messages.messageBody:
Looks like it was a non-event. I checked with the Inglis family on the
Big Island and they were safe. I have a hula friend visiting family on
Oʻahu and sheʻs fine, too.

Robin B.

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT:  Bea's whereabouts?
messages.msgSnippet: Thanks Chris! I just checked! He says they don t have electricity  or water but they have a fireplace and food and drinks. I have not heard from another family
messages.messageBody:
Thanks Chris! I just checked!
He says they don't have electricity or water but they have a fireplace and food and drinks.
I have not heard from another family I know that lives there but I am hoping they are all OK too.


Alex Polikowsky
http://polykow.blogspot.com/

http://groups.yahoo.com/group/unschoolingmn/

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT:  Bea's whereabouts?
messages.msgSnippet: A family member posted on her Facebook page that she is okay.  The rest was in french so I couldn t understand.  Glad to know she s safe. Chris in IA ...
messages.messageBody:
A family member posted on her Facebook page that she is okay. The
rest was in french so I couldn't understand. Glad to know she's safe.

Chris in IA

messages.subject: Re: [AlwaysLearning] OT:  Bea's whereabouts?
messages.msgSnippet: -=- Last I heard she was visiting her father in Chile. Does anyone know where he lives and/or has heard how they are?-=- I think he lives in the mountains on a
messages.messageBody:
-=- Last I heard she was
visiting her father in Chile. Does anyone know where he lives and/or
has heard how they are?-=-

I think he lives in the mountains on a ranch or farm or something.
Not positive, but I had that picture in my head. I could be wrong.
But Holly thinks they are already in Chile. Scheduled to return March
15th or so.

Sandra

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: OT:  Bea's whereabouts?
messages.msgSnippet: Sorry this is way off topic but the earthquake in Chile has me worrying and wondering about Bea Montavani.  Last I heard she was visiting her father in Chile.
messages.messageBody:
Sorry this is way off topic but the earthquake in Chile has me
worrying and wondering about Bea Montavani. Last I heard she was
visiting her father in Chile. Does anyone know where he lives and/or
has heard how they are?

Also sending safe thoughts to everyone in the Pacific - and the
Watkins on Oahu.

Chris in IA
